name: The Ghostly LAB-yrinth
description:
WARNING: THIS IS A HORROR GAME AND MAY CONTAIN SENSITIVE GRAPHICS

How to play - wasd to move, q and e to turn, hold shift to sneak, hold ctrl to sprint.

The game isn't as scary anymore if you can defend yourself. There is no combat system.  You can get out of enemy encounters through other means. Please don't disqualify me from the jam.  Also, the game's lore is found through posters scattered around the world and you discover your own fate and why are you trapped in this maze. At least it isn't a whole block of text at the beginning of the game. (let's see how many people I just called out after everyone has submitted)
developers: John the game dev and the gamer bundle
